issue.title: [CF 350] Icon flashing on cooldown/duration completion.
issue.body:
Icon effects. Tie them in with the event system, probably.

http://www.wowinterface.com/downloads/info10855-TellMeWhen.html#comments


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #350 | Raw

comments.body:
Well, I will start tomorrow. Note to self: Solidify the event framework a little bit more. Remove the need for separate templates, and instead have each module that uses events to specify which components of the template it wants to show, and hide the rest. Use some sort of :OnEventClick() handler type thing to handle the <OnClick>s in the templates.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Also, release tomorrow if no bug reports come in overnight before starting work on this. I want this feature to be in a new version because it is pretty big.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Animations that should be implemented:

  • Screen: Flash
  • Icon: Flash
  • Icon: Shake
  • Icon: Scale
  • Icon: Fade (?)
  • Icon: Move (to center of screen or something) (?)
  • Icon: Yellow activation border thing (?)

Feel free to add any more that you would like (and describe them too, even though i didnt describe mine)

Edited Dec 23, 2011

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
